/** * A DefaultMDIApplication can handle the life cycle of multiple document windows each * being presented in a JInternalFrame of its own. A parent JFrame provides all * the functionality needed to work with documents, such as a menu bar, tool * bars and palette windows. * * * @author Werner Randelshofer. * @version 1.1 2007-12-25 Added method updateViewTitle. *
1.0 June 5, 2006 Created. */
